__e: --Either way, I think it's important that we do this.
AND I WANT IT TO BE GOOD BECAUSE IT'S IMPORTANT THAT YOU'RE DOING THIS, SO...
The important thing is that I'm here, and I'm quite sure that you know who I am.
What matters, is what she is for us?
But all that really matters is that you can see me, and talk to me, and...we can go on from there.
The only thing that matters is that you're here, and I'm here.
The important thing is that I'm here, and I'm quite sure that you know who I am.
I would ask you not to tell me what is important.
If it's important to you, it's important to me.
How can you say we weren't important? We were the only thing that matters.
And they're the ones you care for.
It's you and me that matters to me and you.
It doesn't matter that they're good.
It is very important to me that you should know that I am not.
It's important that you see him for what he truly is.
What's so important you can't tell me now?
Sixty-two, it's important that you remember who you are... not what you are.
- I just sometimes need you not to...
Sixty-two, it's important that you remember who you are... not what you are.
Now I want you to know how important it is for me to be here for you.
It is very important to me that you should know that I am not.
It's just... this is important to me.
But this, me being here, this is important for me.
I mean it was so important to you.
If it's that important to you, you said it.
I don't know why this is so important to you.
Why is money so important in what we do, what we are and what we become?
If it is so simple and important to you, why don't you just go ahead and do it yourself?
But this, me being here, this is important for me.
I know she was important to you.
If you cared for me, I'm asking you to let me go.
Don't tell me it's because you care so damn much.
Must be very important if they let you out of school.
It's gotta be pretty important to be worth dying for.
So it must be pretty important for you to say that it's not important, right?
And at that moment, we and by "we" I mean "me," will be important.
It can't be as important as this.
And that is what you should care about!
